snippet: Wildlife experts say that how you address the problem depends on the extent of the invasion. And once the animal is gone, you need to figure out how it got into your house.
abstract: Alina Tugend Shortcuts column on how to handle animal intruders in home; wildlife experts say how one addresses problem depends on extent of invasion, and once animal is gone, one must figure out how it got in to prevent it from happening again.
lead_paragraph: Wildlife experts say that how you address the problem depends on the extent of the invasion. And once the animal is gone, you need to figure out how it got into your house.

headline.seo: Ridding the House of Errant Raccoons and Other Animals
headline.main: How to Stop a Home Invasion When the Intruder Has Four Legs
headline.print_headline: How to Stop a Home Invasion When the Intruder Has Four Legs
